CIAttributeDescription: Adjusts midtone brightness. This filter is typically used to compensate for nonlinear effects of displays. Adjusting the gamma effectively changes the slope of the transition between black and white.

inputImage.CIAttributeDescription: The image to use as an input image. For filters that also use a background image, this is the foreground image.

inputPower.CIAttributeDescription: A gamma value to use to correct image brightness. The larger the value, the darker the result.
